articles.author: Elvira Pollina
articles.title: Telecom Italia approves KKR's $20 billion grid bid in blow for Vivendi - Reuters
articles.description: Telecom Italia (TIM) (TLIT.MI) on Sunday approved the 19 billion euro ($20 billion) sale of its fixed-line network to U.S. private equity firm KKR
articles.content: MILAN, Nov 6 (Reuters) - Telecom Italia (TIM) (TLIT.MI) on Sunday approved the 19 billion euro ($20 billion) sale of its fixed-line network to U.S. private equity firm KKR (KKR.N), becoming the first… [+3205 chars]

articles.content:
